item.title: Wildfire Skies
item.description: The sky above the port was the color of … Wed, September 9, 2020, San Francisco. The sky above the Bay Area was filled with orange ash and smoke which came from the Bear Fire burning near Oroville, 150 miles northeast of San Francisco. Music by TVO - “Sketch 3 - Hydroacoustics” from https://t-v-o.bandcamp.com/album/distant-lights-receding
